title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Blended Interprofessional Education (IPE) for Enhancing Medical Professionals' Collaborative Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of healthcare systems and teamwork experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate interprofessional collaboration readiness by achieving a 15% or greater improvement in RIPLS scale scores upon IPE program completion
Learners participate at over 80% in activities applying the five ARCS-V motivational design elements (attention, relevance, confidence, satisfaction, volition)
Learners produce case resolution reports integrating three or more professional perspectives in blended learning environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
